grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 杯【ハイ】sake cup, cup for alcoholic beverages, counter for cupfuls, bowlfuls, spoonfuls, etc., counter for boats, counter for octopuses and squid
杯洗【ハイセン】small vessel or bowl in which sake cups are rinsed
賜杯【シハイ】Emperor's cup, trophy given by the Emperor
kun reading compounds: 杯【さかずき】sake cup, cup for alcoholic beverages
杯洗い【さかずきあらい】small vessel or bowl in which sake cups are rinsed
水杯【みずさかずき】farewell cups of water
固めの杯【かためのさかずき】cup of sake used to drink to the establishment of a partnership, commitment to marriage, etc., nuptial cup of sake
